alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Winston; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 5:55PM CDT until April 17 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leake County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Holmes County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Attala County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Winston County in east central Mississippi... Northwestern Scott County in central Mississippi... East central Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Possumneck to 7 miles north of Annandale, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Possumneck around 600 PM CDT. Hesterville around 605 PM CDT. Mcadams around 610 PM CDT. Canton around 615 PM CDT. Kosciusko and Gluckstadt around 620 PM CDT. Smyrna around 640 PM CDT. Goshen Springs, Pisgah and Zama around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Sallis and Redwater. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Holmes; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Winston; Yazoo
